org.eclipselabs.emfpath.base
Class EAttributes

java.lang.Object
  org.eclipselabs.emfpath.base.EStructuralFeatures
      org.eclipselabs.emfpath.base.EAttributes

public final class EAttributes
extends EStructuralFeatures

A search object to find a EAttribute from an EClass. The EAttribute will be search in the whole EClass's hierarchy.

Usage: EAttributes.from(anEClass).named("xxx")

Since:
0.1.0
Author:
MikaÃ«l barbero

Method Detail

from

public static EAttributes from(EClass eClass)
Create an new search object to find EAttribute from the specified eClass.

Parameters:
eClass - the EClass to search in.
Returns:
a new search object
Throws:
IllegalArgumentException - if eClass is null
See Also:
EStructuralFeatures.from(EClass)

named

public EAttribute named(String featureName)
                 throws NoSuchFeatureException
Search for an EAttribute named featureNamed.

Overrides:
named in class EStructuralFeatures
Parameters:
featureName - the name of the searched EStructuralFeature
Returns:
the feature with the search name.
Throws:
NoSuchFeatureException - if there is no EStructuralFeature with name featureName
IllegalArgumentException - if featureName is null or empty
ClassCastException - if the EStructuralFeature named featureName is an EReference and not an EAttribute
See Also:
org.eclipselabs.emfpath.internal.i18n.utils.EStructuralFeatures#named(java.lang.String)
